attributes.action: harsher sentences for Paedophiles and rapists and no suspended sentences..
attributes.additional_details:
You could Break into someone's house and steal their TV or commit fraud against a bank and you can get 7+ years be a dealer and you could also get 7/8+ years even if it's your first time offence
But in England if you're a paedophile rape someone you can walk away with a suspended sentence for eight months where is the justice in this,these victims have had whole lives turned upside down..Save our children
attributes.background:
Longer Harsher sentences for paedophiles and rapists, 
 CPS overhaul 
No suspended sentences to rapists or paedophiles even if it's their first time offence

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323338

Anyone can ask the Attorney General to review a sentence they think is too low if the crime was tried in a Crown Court. Only one person needs to ask for a sentence to be reviewed. You can find out how to do that here:

https://www.gov.uk/complain-about-low-crown-court-sentence
